work_status-not-found:
Occurs in the following special situation: the work does not exist, or has been removed or moved to another location or another name. Does not include "&". No matching information was found.
下載特殊狀況：作品不存在或已被刪除、被移動。不可包含"&"。一致する情報が見つかりませんでした。
; Scope: work_crawler.js: get_work_list()
work_status-limited:
Listed special situations: chapter requests with limited expenses / locked / limited to some systems. Not included "&".
下載特殊狀況：部份章節需要付費/被鎖住/被限制。不可包含"&"
; Scope: work_crawler.js: get_work_list()
work_status-finished:
下載特殊狀況。不可包含"&"
; Scope: work_crawler.js: get_work_list()
last-updated-date:
最近更新日期
